    • Method Detail

      • getDoorOpen

        public boolean getDoorOpen()
        This method is called to give the status of the lift door. So anyone can know if the lift doors are open or closed.
        Returns:
        This returns the boolean status of the lift door

      • getCurrentFloor

        public int getCurrentFloor()
        This method is called to give someone the placement of the lift.
        Returns:
        This returns the int of the elevators current floor

      • getDestinations

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> getDestinations()
        This method is called to give someone the array of all the destinations the elevator is going to.
        Returns:
        This returns an array of destinations which are numbers

      • addDestination

        public static void addDestination(Person person)
        This method allows people to be added to the lift so you can track what people are waiting for the lift and what people are in the lift, this is represented with the boolean as it is always set to false for when people are waiting for the lift. This information is used also to populate what destinations the lift must go to.
        Parameters:
        person - This is the person that is being added to the lift conatining list

      • addDestination

        public void addDestination(int newDestination)
        This method was used mainly for testing purposes. This allows destinations to be added to the lift without people being created.
        Parameters:
        newDestination - This allows destinations to be added to the lift

      • tick

        public void tick()
        This method represents one tick in the simulation, also known as 10 seconds. It will update its destinations to know where it needs to go to next. After it will pull the next destination and decide if it is above or below, if it is not the current floor it will move one floor in the destinations direction. If it is on the current floor it will open its doors, or let people in or out of the lift. If the doors are open and its destinations is not the current floor it will close the doors.

      • remainingCapacity

        public int remainingCapacity()
